@CarpeNoctom There was no inflation / minting bug. The bug relates to the accounting functionality of the wallet software. The patch allows one to independently verify whether they were affected. The bug did not affect the protocol and thus the coin supply was not affected.

#Monero began with a block reward of ~17.6 XMR / Block. It follows a smooth emission curve which lowers the reward every block.  “Halvings” have been recognized at: 8.8 XMR / Block 4.4 XMR / Block  and in 3 months… 2.2 $XMR / Block
